评论概述: So soft and comfortable would be absolutely perfect with pockets
评论详情: The fabric is so amazingly soft. I love these. My only wish is that they had pockets like the other pair I purchased. The quality is great on these and there is even about a foot of fabric liner on the inside that hangs down just below the crotch so they aren't see through. I could live in these.

I truly like the pants, however: the fabric is very delicate! I'm size 22 with cankles....the seam popped open quick. I'm handy enough to fix the problem but not everyone is. Those pants where a blessing in the summer heat, I wear them to slum at home. Wearing them outside I definitely wear some shorties underneath! Are those pants worth the money? Meh... if you value the airyness and comfort at home then yes. For sports action, they may be a bit flimsy.

Got the 'one size'. I'm 5'3.5", 160-165 lbs. Apple body, post menopause, with weight accumulated in my mid section. And they fit great. I get compliments on them all the time. Will buy more for sure. Recommend them. Just fyi--I don't use them in the "halter top" configuration. I wear them solely as pants.

评论概述: Love these and wear them all the time- bleach-proof!!
评论详情: First of all, let me say that as a hairstylist who wears all black and specializes in color these are a GODSEND. I enjoy different/ unique fashion and these are literally perfect for work. Very cool looking, and I don't get too hot in them while working. Very breathable. Haven't lost color after a year. I found out they are bleach proof after forgetting my apron yesterday at work and while doing a corrective color with no apron, got some bleach on them and it DID NOT RUIN THEM!!!!! I wear these almost once a week I love them so much. The only reason I took a star away, is because if I try to wear them as a jumper, the ankles are SO TINY they cut off circulation to my calves (and I don't like that they land mid calf anyway). To be fair I have kind of muscular calves. All in all I love them and the fact that they're bleach proof is so awesome!!!!
The colors are vibrant and fit is comfortable. The only thing that would make it perfect is some pockets.
A lovely product if you are 5'4" or taller. Otherwise, comical. I'm gifting to my tall BFF. Pretty, but not for short girls.
Great quality great price
These fit great! I wear these to my yoga class and have received many compliments on them!
Fabric was terrible. It looks like a linen and would pattern in the photo but in reality it's like thin table cloth fabric with a print on one side. Honestly don't bother with it.
I have several pairs from various brands. These are hands down the highest quality
They are super cute and look very nice on my daughter!! I really like the material very sturdy compared to other pairs she had got.

Super cute. Soft material. Bright color. But it cannot go on the washer or dryer or even dry cleaned. We just dunked them on slightly soapy water and squeezed them (no wringing) and layered it between towels on a table to dry. A hassle, but they’re so comfortable and cool for hot summer days.
Weist is way too small.
Got it fast and fit nicely. Thank you
Comfortable and fun looking harem pants. Sometimes it's a little awkward to sit cross legged in pants like this but otherwise they are great. Nice material and print.
I love that there’s a lil extra fabric around the butt to cover any pantry lines and add a sturdiness to it. Super comfortable fit and fabric. I will be buying more in the future!

I got the orange stripe. I am 5'2", about size 12 pants. The leg cuffs are slightly elasticated, and fit my medium-sized calves tightly enough to stay put when pulled up to just below the widest part of my calf. This way, It looks like a loose bubble skirt. When pulled down to my ankles, it looks more like 'harem'  pants. These do work as a tube-top romper on me, as shown, though I doubt I will wear them that way.  Good range of motion in all configurations. Thin fabric, nice for summer or (I suppose) yoga. I will likely wear them on the patio in summer, since they are loose like a skirt but without flying insects getting to sensitive spots!The thin white cloth 'modesty panel' is sort of a miniskirt attached to the inside at the waistband, but it tends to ride up and get bunchy. In this dark color I am not worried about underwear showing through, and I usually wear boxer-briefs with skirts and loose trousers anyway (to avoid the 'chub-rub'), so I will likely cut out the inner panel.  Only real complain: no pockets!
Couldn’t get the smell to go away for weeks and when it finally did the fabric was so thin and worn from all the washing 😔
I love these! (And bought 2 more pairs.) The fabric is soft and the pattern is beautiful. I don't mind that the fabric is thin - I live in Arizona, so it's perfect!

评论概述: Material is thicker and the elastic band isn't as wide
评论详情: I've bought these harem jumpsuits several times before and normally they're made of a gauzier material that is very comfortable on super-hot days, and the waist band is normally twice the width of that of the regular harem pants so that when you wear it as a jumpsuit it covers the breast area the way a bandeau top would. The material of this is not super thick but definitely not gauzy and the narrow elastic band doesn't begin to cover my breasts. Had to send it back.

I liked it but it's vaguely short for me (5'7) and the bottom doesn't stretch over my calf muscles so it causes restrictive movement.  Yoga pants are much more fluid in movement than these are.  I can't even drive while wearing these and sitting in various positions are sometimes limited. I liked them, just usually don't wear them based on the restrictive movement when I bought them for higher level of movement.
Comfort in the heat and soft. Love the colors and feel of the material.

I have already 5 pairs of those pants different colors and planning to get more. They are just amazing. If you are pregnant postpartum or just love feeling of freedom those pants for you. They are amazing for play with my toddler. They are amazing for beach, yoga, pool party, shopping and billion of other places with correct combination. I love those pants they are so comfortable. I constantly receiving compliments about those pants and the skirt. The only thing I definitely would recommend do not dry it at the dryer because it’s natural material and it shrinks, but it also stretches back once you will wash it and hang for natural dry.
Very flowy and breathable. Perfect for summer.
